popup.title: Travel to Other Dimensions
popup.description: [[Map:Minecraft Dungeons Other Dimensions]]

popup.title: Panda Plateau
popup.description: PROTECT THE PANDAS – Within a secluded bamboo forest, perched on the face of a sprawling cliffside, a community of pandas have escaped the corrupting presence of the shard - until now. We need to fight back against the sprawling, strangling vines which have threatened to take over the homes of

popup.title: Dingy Jungle
popup.description: ENTANGLED IN VINES – We've tracked the Orb's shard to the edge of a dense jungle where dangerous creatures creep out from under the thick canopy. What brave hero would dare cut through the twisting vines to reach the dark power that hides within?

popup.title: Overgrown Temple
popup.description: TANGLE IN THE TEMPLE – Deep within the jungle lies an overgrown temple, a place where nature has reclaimed its rightful place as ruler of the land. Could the shard have landed here?

popup.title: Daily Trial
popup.description: Dingy Jungle Daily Trial

popup.title: Colossal Rampart
popup.description: FORMIDABLE FORTIFICATIONS – A formidable wall twists along the base of these mighty peaks, stretching endlessly in every direction. These impressive defenses, abandoned long ago, have now been claimed by [[MCD:Illager|Illagers]] who seek to control the entire mountain range. Drive the Illagers

popup.title: Windswept Peaks
popup.description: STORM AT THE SUMMIT. A shard from the Orb of Dominance landed atop these mountain peaks, and now dark storms howl and snows swirl around the summit. The powerful winds carry the corrupting power of the shard, and if it is not stopped the world will surely be blown away by its power.

popup.title: Gauntlet of Gales
popup.description: A DAUNTING GAUNTLET – The puzzles and winding paths are aplenty in the Gauntlet of Gales. Enter the sanctum and complete the challenges to say that you’ve truly conquered the gauntlet!

popup.title: Gale Sanctum
popup.description: A TEMPLE ATOP THE PEAKS – A temple rises from the towering peaks where the winds are woven into the ancient sanctum's very structure. Harness the wind's power and claim undiscovered treasures, but mind the ancient protector within: the [[MCD:Tempest Golem|Tempest Golem]].

popup.title: Daily Trial
popup.description: Colossal Rampart Daily Trial

popup.title: Lost Settlement
popup.description: SNOWFLAKE IN A BLIZZARD – Long ago, a group of miners built a settlement on the shores of a great lake to harness the powerful energies hidden under the surface. But as time passed, the settlement was forgotten, and now the creeping winter has locked it away in ice. Who would be brave enough t

popup.title: Lone Fortress
popup.description: COLD AND ALONE – An isolated fortress seems to be the source of the never-ending winter. Worst of all, from somewhere deep within those lonely ramparts, [[MCD:Wretched Wraith|something terrible]] screams out with rage and fury. We have to push forward through snow-covered hallways and collapsi

popup.title: Frosted Fjord
popup.description: THE WINDING, WINTRY PATH – To reach the source of the creeping winter, we must journey into the deep reaches of the wintry wilderness, with only a frozen river as our guide. Icy paths and dangerous enemies attack through the wind and snow, but the distant sight of a lone fortress could serve a

popup.title: Daily Trial
popup.description: Lone Fortress Daily Trial

popup.title: Coral Rise
popup.description: DANGER IN THE CORALS- Home to colorful corals and schools of playful tropical fish, Coral Rise is full of life and breathtaking sights. It would be easy to be lulled into a false sense of security by the serene beauty, but the Orb’s corruption brews beneath the sandy surface. Hordes of Drowned

popup.title: Abyssal Monument
popup.description: SUNKEN SPRAWL – An unbelievable sunken temple sprawls before you, a place lost long ago to time and the changing currents of an indifferent ocean. Forgotten secrets that lie within have been warped by the Orb's corruption, protected by enemies whose weapons and wits have not dulled despite cou

popup.title: Radiant Ravine
popup.description: UNDERSEA OASIS – While most deep ravines are cold and pitch black, the Radiant Ravine is an ever-shifting kaleidoscope of color! Bioluminescent life forms live among the vibrant underwater foliage - but so do legions of Drowned and other hostile creatures.

popup.title: Treetop Tangle
popup.description: THE TREASURE ABOVE – Remnants of the Orb's corruption linger in the jungle, the ruins of an ancient temple carried high above by the corrupted wildlife. What treasure might be found at the top of this colossal tree?
